ygData.subject: Re: rez question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Lanadina the Magician  To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com  Date: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 10:30 AM Subject: Re:
ygData.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: Lanadina the Magician <lanadina@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 10:30 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] rez question


>From: Lanadina the Magician <lanadina@...>
>
>I couldnt agree with you more!!!! Last night Fennin Ro had OVER 1950 people
>on that ONE server!!!!!! They need to lock that server down completely and
>possibly move any level 10 and below character over to another server.
>Personally, I don't think ANY server should ave more than 500 people on it.

I agree with others that Verant should not forcibly move people off a
server. I made good friends at level 5 and 6, fighting in the Orc camps
outside Kelethin, and they are friends to this day. Would have hated to be
moved away from them. Closing down the server to newbies is also
problematic. I think the world works best when there are players of all
levels in it. Heck, if there are no younger players, whom am I supposed to
sell all this ring I am getting in Unrest to? ;-) That would benefit the
power-levelers, who would always have people below them to sell loot to, and
hurt everyone else, who would not. Besides, having people of widely
different experience levels just makes for a more interesting world.

>Also, they need to have more than one zone carry certain 'very saught'
after
>items, such as Rubicite armor. Why does Cazic Thule have to be the only
>zone? Of COURSE there will be 70-100 people in the zone! Move the Ruby
>around...put some in Rathe Mountains, make a level 25+ zone on Erudin so
>Ruby can drop there....but not all in one zone. Look at the Journeyman
>boots. ONE NPC in the entire game has it, its a no drop item, meaning you
>have to loot it yourself. Why cant this npc drop it everytime to stop
>overcamping and people from Kill stealing? No, that would make way too much
>sense, I guess.

I agree with this. Every 10th level wants bronze, every 20th level
wants rubicite. Therefore Unrest is jammed with the small races after small
bronze, and Cazic is jammed with people after rubicite. We need these items
more widely distributed.

>Over camping and lagging CAN end if some of the ideas that so many have
sent
>in are implemented. But of course, that would cause Verant having to
>actually DO something...can't have that. (naww...I'm not upset heheh
<grin>)
>
>Lanadina


== Gilead, 19th level dwarven cleric, Fennin Ro
